00016 #define MAX_NO_OPEN_FILES 100
00017 
00018 /* Structure for user to do recursive search for files in a selected drive */
00019 struct HostIterStatType {
00020     CHAR    fname[10];      /* Null terminated file and extension */
00021     CHAR    fext[4];
00022     UINT16  fattribute;     /* File attributes */
00023     UINT16  ftime;          /* Time & Date last modified. See date */
00024     UINT16  fdate;          /* and time handlers for getting info */
00025     UINT32  fsize;          /* File size */
00026     CHAR    path[MAX_PATH]; /* Null terminated directory path */
00027     CHAR    device_id[3];   /* device id */
00028     INT32   filehandle;
00029     CHAR    patternName[MAX_PATH];
00030     CHAR    longFileName[   MAX_PATH];
00031 };
00032 
00033 /* Date stamp structure */
00034 struct DateStr {
00035     UINT16 date;            /* Current Date */
00036     UINT16 time;            /* Current time */
00037 };
00038 
00039 struct HostFileStatType {
00040     UINT32   st_mode;               /* (see S_xxxx below) */
00041     UINT32   st_size;               /* file size, in bytes */
00042     DateStr st_accesstime;          /* last access (all times are the same) */
00043     DateStr st_modificationtime;    /* last modification */
00044     DateStr st_creationtime;        /* last file status change */
00045     INT16   st_deviceId;            /* (drive number, rtfs) */
00046     INT16   st_inode;               /* inode number (0) */
00047     INT16   st_nlink;               /* (always 1) */
00048     INT16   st_rdev;                /* (drive number, rtfs) */
00049     UINT16  fattribute;             /* File attributes - DOS attributes
00050                                        (non standard but useful) */
00051 };
